task.prompt: Mr. Jesiah is a dairy cow farmer with cows producing 200 gallons of milk every day. The expenses for maintenance of the dairy farm and purchase of feeds is $3000 per month. Calculate his total income in June if he sells 1 gallon of milk at $3.55.

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Mr. Jesiah is a dairy cow farmer with cows producing 200 gallons of milk every day. The expenses for maintenance of the dairy farm and purchase of feeds is $3000 per month. Calculate his total income in June if he sells 1 gallon of milk at $3.55.
